mean_en: the right or ability to do something that is given by someone who has the power to decide if it will be allowed or permitted
word_etyma: per始终+miss送，放出+ion名词后缀→始终放入→permission允许
sentence: They gave me an American visa, so I now have permission to travel there.
sentence_trans: 他们给了我一份美国签证，所以现在我可以去那里旅游了。
